name: Refresh Trigger
description: Pull-to-refresh wrapper with customizable indicator, extents, and completion animations.

use: you need a pull-to-refresh interaction on scrollables.
avoid: you already use platform-specific refresh controls.

patterns.title: Custom indicator
patterns.code:
RefreshTrigger(
  indicatorBuilder: (context, stage) => DefaultRefreshIndicator(stage: stage),
  onRefresh: () async {},
  child: ListView(children: const [Text('Item')]),
)

theming: `RefreshTriggerTheme` controls min/max extents, curves, and completion duration.
accessibility: Ensure the refresh action also has a non-gesture alternative (button/shortcut).
dont: Trigger long-running refresh operations without feedback.
